title: The Week of Valor: Frank Torres
summary: At 67, Frank Torres discovers his hidden abilities and saves his town from an impending disaster.
summaryGerman: Mit 67 entdeckt Frank Torres seine verborgenen Fähigkeiten und rettet seine Stadt vor einer bevorstehenden Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Op 67-jarige leeftijd ontdekt Frank Torres zijn verborgen vaardigheden en redt hij zijn stad van een dreigende ramp.
summaryFrench: À 67 ans, Frank Torres découvre ses capacités cachées et sauve sa ville d'une catastrophe imminente.

story.text: Frank Torres wakes feeling unusually energetic, with a sense he can do more than ever before.
While training at the local gym, Frank stops a machinery accident with reflexes he didn’t know he had.
Reports of strange tremors across town unsettle Frank. He feels an eerie connection to these events.
Investigating the tremors, Frank discovers an underground lab. He’s filled with a sense of purpose.
With his new abilities, Frank dismantles a device in the lab designed to trigger earthquakes, saving countless lives.
The town celebrates Frank as a hero. At 67, he experiences a moment of romantic admiration from his long-time crush.
Reflecting on his actions, Frank feels peaceful, ready to continue serving his community in new ways.

ending: Thus, Frank Torres found not just his strength but his place as a guardian of his town.
moral: No matter the age, one can always be the hero of their own story.
